info.sourceTextContent: La comarca comprendida entre el Bidasoa y Bayona ó el Adour, era la Gascuña propiamente dicha, tan célebre en Francia por las fanfarronadas y astucias de sus habitantes, cuyo tipo han personificado Dumas y Maquet en su famoso D'Artagnan de los Tres Mosqueteros.
info.suspiciousTextContent: The region between the Bidasoa and Bayonne or the Adour, Gascony itself was so famous in France for the bluff and cunning of its inhabitants, whose type Dumas and Maquet have embodied in his famous D'Artagnan of Three Musketeers.
